body_html:
I faced the same problem too. The problem is once the model is created for first time, there is a copy of the structure stored in this location "/tmp/mnist_convnet_model". This is line where it gets created # #Create the Estimator
mnist_classifier = learn.Estimator(
model_fn=cnn_model_fn, model_dir="/tmp/mnist_convnet_model")
Delete this folder and change the filter size and rerun your program. Hopefully this should solve it.

body:
I faced the same problem too. The problem is once the model is created for first time, there is a copy of the structure stored in this location "/tmp/mnist_convnet_model". This is line where it gets created # #Create the Estimator
mnist_classifier = learn.Estimator(
      model_fn=cnn_model_fn, model_dir="/tmp/mnist_convnet_model")
Delete this folder and change the filter size and rerun your program. Hopefully this should solve it.
